mapper.sql: vid, number, volunteername, vtime, neednum, applicantsnum, contacts, cphone, publisher, college, releasetime, endtime, assemblytime, collectionplace, content
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from volunteer
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into volunteer (vid, number, volunteername, vtime, neednum, applicantsnum, contacts, cphone, publisher, college, releasetime, endtime, assemblytime, collectionplace, content ) values (#{vid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{volunteername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{neednum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{applicantsnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{college,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{releasetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{assemblytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{collectionplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

number,
volunteername,
vtime,
neednum,
applicantsnum,
contacts,
cphone,
publisher,
college,
releasetime,
endtime,
assemblytime,
collectionplace,
content,

mapper.update:
update volunteer
vid = #{record.vid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
number = #{record.number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
volunteername = #{record.volunteername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vtime = #{record.vtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
neednum = #{record.neednum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
applicantsnum = #{record.applicantsnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
contacts = #{record.contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cphone = #{record.cphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
publisher = #{record.publisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
college = #{record.college,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
releasetime = #{record.releasetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endtime = #{record.endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
assemblytime = #{record.assemblytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
collectionplace = #{record.collectionplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{record.content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update volunteer set vid = #{record.vid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, number = #{record.number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, volunteername = #{record.volunteername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vtime = #{record.vtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, neednum = #{record.neednum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, applicantsnum = #{record.applicantsnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, contacts = #{record.contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cphone = #{record.cphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publisher = #{record.publisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, college = #{record.college,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, releasetime = #{record.releasetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endtime = #{record.endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, assemblytime = #{record.assemblytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, collectionplace = #{record.collectionplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{record.content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update volunteer
number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
volunteername = #{volunteername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vtime = #{vtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
neednum = #{neednum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
applicantsnum = #{applicantsnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
contacts = #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cphone = #{cphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
publisher = #{publisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
college = #{college,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
releasetime = #{releasetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
assemblytime = #{assemblytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
collectionplace = #{collectionplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where vid = #{vid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update volunteer set number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, volunteername = #{volunteername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vtime = #{vtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, neednum = #{neednum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, applicantsnum = #{applicantsnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, contacts = #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cphone = #{cphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publisher = #{publisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, college = #{college,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, releasetime = #{releasetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, assemblytime = #{assemblytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, collectionplace = #{collectionplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where vid = #{vid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from volunteer where 1 = 1
and volunteername like concat('%',#{volunteername},'%')
and contacts like concat('%',#{contacts},'%')
and college like concat('%',#{college},'%')
and vstate like concat('%',#{vstate},'%')

select v.number,u.unumber,u.snumber,u.username,u.phone,v.begintime,v.examinetime,v.examine,v.vstate,v.assemblytime,v.collectionplace,v.content from volunteer v,user u where 1 = 1
and u.username like concat('%',#{username},'%')
and u.snumber like concat('%',#{snumber},'%')
and u.phone like concat('%',#{phone},'%')
and v.vstate like concat('%',#{vstate},'%')
ORDER BY u.unumber
